Entities.Interface

Interface EntityInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Entity, Player

    public interface EntityInterface
    Entity Interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeImageIndex()
      Change the index of the image used by the entity to play an animation.
      void destroy(Entity entity)
      Remove the entity from the entity array, cutting al reference to him so the gc will be free to free the memory.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Image> getImage()
      Return the ArrayList containing all the images used by the entity.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Return the name of the entity.
      java.awt.Point getPosition()
      Return the actual position of the entity.
      void move(Direction direction, int speed)
      Move the entity in a given direction according to his speed.

    • Method Detail

        Remove the entity from the entity array, cutting al reference to him so the gc will be free to free the memory.

        java.lang.String getName()
        Return the name of the entity.

      • getPosition

        java.awt.Point getPosition()
        Return the actual position of the entity.

        Return the ArrayList containing all the images used by the entity.

      • move

        void move(Direction direction,
        int speed)
        Move the entity in a given direction according to his speed.
        Parameters:

        Change the index of the image used by the entity to play an animation.
